messages.message:
Hi @cyrille, I have tested the following scenarios for chatbot redirect using Async Query API, and it worked as expected.
• The user has created a chatbot and raised a query using the chatbot id Async API.
• The chatbot owner updated the chatbot and raised a query using the older chatbot ID.
• The Org-Member raised a query for the shared chatbot using older chatbot ID.
• The chatbot owner updated the chatbot again.
• The Org-Member raised a query for the shared chatbot using older chatbot ID.
LMK if you have experienced this issue again or have a flow where you are getting 403.
